txt.en: Siege equipment in disrepair can be found at Adambel.\n\nYou should repair the siege equipment.

'It has been a long while since the Enemy attacked us directly at Adambel, and the siege equipment has fallen into disrepair. If you are able to do so, inspect the siege equipment here at the encampment and see if any of it is salvageable.'
E채rtur, the Prince of Belfalas, has noted that the siege equipment in Adambel has fallen into disrepair from lack of use.
E채rtur can be found at Adambel.\n\nYou should talk to E채rtur.

'The siege equipment is in working order again? These are happy tidings! It is to be hoped we do not have need of them, but in the event we do we will have you to thank for this repair. What further tasks might be solved by sending you in their direction, my capable friend? Find something and do it, for the Great Alliance is always in need of assistance, as you well know.'
